query: dialog with R's persona: persona: my dream in life is to work from home. i dye my hair every three months. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it. i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. context:  Q: i feel that . i can speak a lot of languages , especially chinese ! R: my father , who is an electrician , knows a lot of languages from his experience around the world . Q: what is your opinion on chocolate bars ? i love them haha . R: <extra_id_0>
answers: i love chocolate bars . almost as much as i like rpgs
generation: i love them, but i have a bad habit of eating them.

passages.title: Bill Goes to Graduate School
passages.text: I decide that I want to pursue a master's degree after college. While my friends are all looking for jobs, I am applying for a school. At first I worried that I was making the wrong decision. However, when I get to graduate school, I feel great. I am proud that I will soon have a master's degree.

passages.title: Going Home
passages.text: I am far from home. I miss my family. One day I realized I did not have to live far away. I moved home. My family was happy to have my back.

passages.title: Fireman
passages.text: I was turning 4 and told my mom my birthday wish. I wished to be a fireman for my birthday! My mom pondered this impossibility, then brightened. I set up a tour of the local fire station with its kind firemen. I got to be a foreman on my birthday after all!

passages.title: Freight.
passages.text: I wanted to travel but I did not have money. I decided to do some research and get on a train. I found out the nearest freight train goes to California. I planned it right and got on it. I then see other people on it.

passages.title: New Paint
passages.text: Today I decided to paint my laundry room. It was very hard to move both appliances. I had to call my friend to help me move the washer. He helped me clear the room and helped me paint. I was glad I called my friend for help.

passages.title: Forgotten
passages.text: I was upset my family hadn't saved my breakfast. I had been looking forward to my grandma's cooking for days. I decided to cook my own breakfast. Just then my grandma came in to find out what I was doing. It turned out my grandma put my plate in the oven to keep it warm.
